verses.verse: And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%>'s sojournings <S%H4033><s%>, in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>.

These are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>. Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, being seventeen <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, was feeding <S%H7462><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> with his brethren <S%H251><s%>; and he was a lad <S%H5288><s%> with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhah <S%H1090><s%>, and with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zilpah <S%H2153><s%>, his father <S%H1><s%>'s wives <S%H802><s%>: and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> report <S%H1681><s%> of them unto their father <S%H1><s%>.

Now Israel <S%H3478><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> more than all his children <S%H1121><s%>, because he was the son <S%H1121><s%> of his old age <S%H2208><s%>: and he made <S%H6213><s%> him a coat <S%H3801><s%> of many colors <S%H6446><s%>.

And his brethren <S%H251><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that their father <S%H1><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> him more than all his brethren <S%H251><s%>; and they hated <S%H8130><s%> him <S%H3201><s%>, and could not speak <S%H1696><s%> peaceably unto him <S%H7965><s%>.
And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> dreamed <S%H2492><s%> a dream <S%H2472><s%>, and he told <S%H5046><s%> it to his brethren <S%H251><s%>: and they hated <S%H8130><s%> him yet the more <S%H3254><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H8085><s%>, Hear, I pray you <S%H2472><s%>, this dream which I have dreamed <S%H2492><s%>:

for <S%H481><s%>, behold, we were binding sheaves <S%H485><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>, and <S%H485><s%>, lo, my sheaf arose <S%H6965><s%>, and also stood upright <S%H5324><s%>; and <S%H485><s%>, behold, your sheaves came round about <S%H5437><s%>, and made obeisance <S%H7812><s%> to my sheaf <S%H485><s%>.

And his brethren <S%H251><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him <S%H4427><s%>, Shalt thou indeed reign <S%H4427><s%> over us <S%H4910><s%>? or shalt thou indeed have dominion <S%H4910><s%> over us <S%H8130><s%>? And they hated him yet the more <S%H3254><s%> for his dreams <S%H2472><s%>, and for his words <S%H1697><s%>.

And he dreamed <S%H2492><s%> yet another <S%H312><s%> dream <S%H2472><s%>, and told <S%H5608><s%> it to his brethren <S%H251><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H2492><s%>, I have dreamed yet a dream <S%H2472><s%>: and <S%H8121><s%>, behold, the sun and the moon <S%H3394><s%> and eleven <S%H6240><s%> stars <S%H3556><s%> made obeisance to me <S%H7812><s%>.

And he told <S%H5608><s%> it to his father <S%H1><s%>, and to his brethren <S%H251><s%>; and his father <S%H1><s%> rebuked <S%H1605><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, and said unto him <S%H2472><s%>, What is this dream that thou hast dreamed <S%H2492><s%>? Shall I and thy mother <S%H517><s%> and thy brethren <S%H251><s%> indeed <S%H935><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to bow down <S%H7812><s%> ourselves to thee to the earth <S%H776><s%>?
And his brethren <S%H251><s%> envied <S%H7065><s%> him <S%H1><s%>; but his father kept <S%H8104><s%> the saying in mind <S%H1697><s%>.
And his brethren <S%H251><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to feed <S%H7462><s%> their father <S%H1><s%>'s flock <S%H6629><s%> in Shechem <S%H7927><s%>.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, Are not thy brethren <S%H251><s%> feeding <S%H7462><s%> the flock in Shechem <S%H7927><s%>? come <S%H3212><s%>, and I will send thee <S%H7971><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>. And he said to him, Here am I.

And he said <S%H559><s%> to him <S%H3212><s%>, Go now <S%H7200><s%>, see whether it is well <S%H7965><s%> with thy brethren <S%H251><s%>, and well <S%H7965><s%> with the flock <S%H6629><s%>; and bring <S%H7725><s%> me word <S%H1697><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>. So he sent <S%H7971><s%> him out of the vale <S%H6010><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, and he came <S%H935><s%> to Shechem <S%H7927><s%>.

And a certain man <S%H376><s%> found him <S%H4672><s%>, and <S%H8582><s%>, behold, he was wandering in the field <S%H7704><s%>: and the man <S%H376><s%> asked him <S%H7592><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, What seekest thou <S%H1245><s%>?
And he said <S%H559><s%>, I am seeking <S%H1245><s%> my brethren <S%H251><s%>: tell <S%H5046><s%> me <S%H375><s%>, I pray thee, where they are feeding the flock <S%H7462><s%>.

And the man <S%H376><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, They are departed <S%H5265><s%> hence <S%H2088><s%>; for I heard <S%H8085><s%> them say <S%H559><s%>, Let us go <S%H3212><s%> to Dothan <S%H1886><s%>. And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> his brethren <S%H251><s%>, and found <S%H4672><s%> them in Dothan <S%H1886><s%>.
And they saw <S%H7200><s%> him afar off <S%H7350><s%>, and before he came near <S%H7126><s%> unto them <S%H5230><s%>, they conspired against him to slay him <S%H4191><s%>.
And they said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H251><s%>, Behold <S%H1976><s%>, this dreamer <S%H1167><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%>.

Come <S%H3212><s%> now therefore <S%H2026><s%>, and let us slay him <S%H7993><s%>, and cast him into one <S%H259><s%> of the pits <S%H953><s%>, and we will say <S%H559><s%>, An evil <S%H7451><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> hath devoured <S%H398><s%> him <S%H7200><s%>: and we shall see what will become of his dreams <S%H2472><s%>.
And Reuben <S%H7205><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it <S%H5337><s%>, and delivered him out of their hand <S%H3027><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Let us not take his life <S%H5221><s%>.

And Reuben <S%H7205><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H8210><s%>, Shed no blood <S%H1818><s%>; cast <S%H7993><s%> him into this pit <S%H953><s%> that is in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, but lay <S%H7971><s%> no hand <S%H3027><s%> upon him <S%H5337><s%>: that he might deliver him out of their hand <S%H3027><s%>, to restore <S%H7725><s%> him to his father <S%H1><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H3130><s%>, when Joseph was come <S%H935><s%> unto his brethren <S%H251><s%>, that they stripped Joseph <S%H3130><s%> of <S%H854><s%> his coat <S%H3801><s%>, the coat <S%H3801><s%> of <S%H854><s%> many colors that was on him <S%H6446><s%>;
and they took <S%H3947><s%> him <S%H7993><s%>, and cast him into the pit <S%H953><s%>: and the pit <S%H953><s%> was empty <S%H7386><s%>, there was no water in it <S%H4325><s%>.

And they sat down <S%H3427><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>: and they lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> and looked <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H736><s%>, behold, a caravan of Ishmaelites <S%H3459><s%> was coming <S%H935><s%> from Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, with their camels <S%H1581><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> spicery <S%H5219><s%> and balm <S%H6875><s%> and myrrh <S%H3910><s%>, going <S%H1980><s%> to carry it down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his brethren <S%H251><s%>, What profit <S%H1215><s%> is it if we slay <S%H2026><s%> our brother <S%H251><s%> and conceal <S%H3680><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%>?

Come <S%H3212><s%>, and let us sell <S%H4376><s%> him to the Ishmaelites <S%H3459><s%>, and let not our hand <S%H3027><s%> be upon him <S%H251><s%>; for he is our brother, our flesh <S%H1320><s%>. And his brethren <S%H251><s%> hearkened unto him <S%H8085><s%>.

And there passed <S%H5674><s%> by Midianites <S%H4084><s%>, merchantmen <S%H582><s%>; and they drew <S%H4900><s%> and lifted up <S%H5927><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> out of the pit <S%H953><s%>, and sold <S%H4376><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> to the Ishmaelites <S%H3459><s%> for twenty <S%H6242><s%> pieces of silver <S%H3701><s%>. And they brought <S%H935><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
And Reuben <S%H7205><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> unto the pit <S%H953><s%>; and <S%H3130><s%>, behold, Joseph was not in the pit <S%H953><s%>; and he rent <S%H7167><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%>.
And he returned <S%H7725><s%> unto his brethren <S%H251><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, The child <S%H3206><s%> is not <S%H575><s%>; and I, whither shall I go <S%H935><s%>?

And they took <S%H3947><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s coat <S%H3801><s%>, and killed <S%H7819><s%> a <S%H8163><s%> he-goat <S%H5795><s%>, and dipped <S%H2881><s%> the coat <S%H3801><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%>;

and they sent <S%H7971><s%> the coat <S%H3801><s%> of many colors <S%H6446><s%>, and they brought <S%H935><s%> it to their father <S%H1><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, This have we found <S%H4672><s%>: know <S%H5234><s%> now whether it is thy son <S%H1121><s%>'s coat or not <S%H3801><s%>.

And he knew it <S%H5234><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, It is my son <S%H1121><s%>'s coat <S%H3801><s%>; an evil <S%H7451><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> hath devoured <S%H398><s%> him <S%H3130><s%>; Joseph is without doubt <S%H2963><s%> torn in pieces <S%H2963><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> rent <S%H7167><s%> his garments <S%H8071><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> upon his loins <S%H4975><s%>, and mourned <S%H56><s%> for his son <S%H1121><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And all his sons <S%H1121><s%> and all his daughters <S%H1323><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> to comfort <S%H5162><s%> him <S%H3985><s%>; but he refused to be comforted <S%H5162><s%>; and he said <S%H559><s%>, For I will go down <S%H3381><s%> to Sheol <S%H7585><s%> to my son <S%H1121><s%> mourning <S%H57><s%>. And his father <S%H1><s%> wept for him <S%H1058><s%>.

And the Midianites <S%H4092><s%> sold <S%H4376><s%> him into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> unto Potiphar <S%H6318><s%>, an officer <S%H5631><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s, the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the guard <S%H2876><s%>.
